title-group.article-title: INDIARA NUNES MESQUITA FERREIRA, DANIELLE DE OLIVEIRA DINIZ, FERNANDA GOMES FERREIRA & FÁBIO VENTUROLI (2024) A new species of Oxandra (Annonaceae) from the Brazilian Cerrado. Phytotaxa 636 (3): 246-251

sec.title: N/A
sec.p:
INDIARA NUNES MESQUITA FERREIRA , DANIELLE DE
OLIVEIRA DINIZ, FERNANDA GOMES FERREIRA & FÁBIO VENTUROLI ( 2024 )
A new species of Oxandra (Annonaceae) from the Brazilian Cerrado. Phytotaxa 636 ( 3 ): 246–251
Please note the Acknowledgements on page 6:

We thank the Coordenação de aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior (CAPES) agency, which provided a scholarship grant for the first author. We would also like to thank the Serviço Florestal brasileiro, Legado Verdes do Cerrado, Universidade Federal de Goiás and Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FaO) for project financing. We are grateful to Carlos de Morais Gomes for assistance and support during botanical collections. Contributions from reviewers are greatly appreciated.

We would also like to thank the Serviço Florestal Brasileiro, Legado Verdes do Cerrado, Inventário Florestal Nacional, Universidade Federal de Goiás and Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FaO) for project financing. We are grateful to Carlos de Morais Gomes for assistance and support during botanical collections. Contributions from reviewers are greatly appreciated.
